ComicInfo.Title: Darkness, Once Gazed Upon Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary: “Darkness, Once Gazed Upon” is a rescue mission to Iacon as Arcee, Windblade, Chromia, and Smokescreen link up with two long-lost allies left in the city. Their goal: to rescue a captured Autobot general. But things are never easy when Swindle’s involved!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 21:59:57. [CVDB898477]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Milne, Chris Panda, Livio Ramondelli
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha
ComicInfo.Characters: Arcee, Astrotrain, Catgut, Chromia, Codexa, Cyclonus, Flamewar, Gauge, Greenlight, Megatron, Mindwipe, Optimus Prime, Ravage, Roughstuff, Shadow Stalker, Sixshot, Skytread, Slipstream, Smokescreen, Soundwave, Starscream, Strika, Swindle, TrickDiamond, Ultra Magnus, Windblade
